message: I have a unique opportunity to sell this product to you at a special price. I'm willing to let it go for $11000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $10500, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'd be willing to pay $9800 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
